name: VITAMIN & MINERAL DEFICIENCY TEST
title: Assess Your Vitamin & Mineral Levels
instructions: Answer the following questions based on your nutritional health symptoms. Score: 1 = Never, 2 = Sometimes, 3 = Frequently, 4 = Often, 5 = Always. Total score at the end of each section will let you know your nutritional health risks and suggested recommendations immediately.

sections.name: vitamin-deficiency
sections.title: Vitamin & Mineral Deficiency
sections.description: Tobacco use depletes essential vitamins and minerals, leading to weakened immunity and slow recovery.

questions.question: Do you often feel fatigued or weak?
Have you experienced frequent infections or slow wound healing?
Do you have brittle nails, hair loss, or dry skin?
Have you been diagnosed with anemia or vitamin deficiencies?
